entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Manicouagan
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
